mapper.select: SELECT f.`fid`,f.`fcode`,f.`fname`,f.`fpid` FROM `function` f INNER JOIN `pa` p ON f.`fid`=p.`fid` INNER JOIN `role` r ON p.`rid`=r.`rid` INNER JOIN `user` u ON r.`rid`=u.`rid` WHERE u.`user`='admin' AND u.`pwd`='admin' and f.fpid!=0
